main event: Radar contacts detected at Gimili RCAF Station, Canada, involving unidentified flying objects on November 7, 1957.
interesting points: The radar operator reported fast-moving circular targets that seemed to be intelligently controlled., The first contact was observed at 2300Z moving rapidly southeast and then south., A second contact appeared at 2307Z, also moving rapidly and remaining on the radar scope for 4 minutes., The weather conditions at the time included wind from 220 degrees at 30 knots and visibility of 15 miles., The document was part of Project Blue Book, a historical program by the United States Air Force to study UFOs.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects of circular shape
witness description: a radar operator at Gimili RCAF Station
